predicate.note: Frames file for 'attach' based on survey of sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet class shake-22.3-2, seven senses. Comparison to 'match' and 'tie' to avoid the nasty figure/ground distinction.

role.descr: agent, entity causing two objects to be attached

example.name: double Arg1
example.text: The equity kicker is not attached to the offering, ...

example.name: with agent
example.text: John attached the apology note to his dissertation.

example.name: with instrument, single arg1
example.text: John and Mary are attached by bonds of love.
